instructions: From the Home screen, tap Apps . Tap Settings . Scroll down the list and tap About . Tap Software information . Review the information in the Review software version details section below.
From the Home screen, tap Apps . Tap Settings . Scroll down the list and tap About . Tap Software information . Review the information in the Review software version details section below.
From the Home screen, tap the Apps icon. Tap Settings . Tap About . Tap Software updates . Tap Check Now and follow the on-screen prompts.

Image titled Change Your Primary Apple ID Phone Number on an iPhone Step 1 1 Open your old iPhone's Settings. This is the grey cog-shaped icon that can be found one of your home screens. It may also be in a folder labeled Utilities. You will be signing out of iMessage and FaceTime in order to disassociate your phone number linked to your Apple ID. Image titled Change Your Primary Apple ID Phone Number on an iPhone Step 2 2 Scroll down and tap . Image titled Change Your Primary Apple ID Phone Number on an iPhone Step 3 3 Scroll down and tap . Image titled Change Your Primary Apple ID Phone Number on an iPhone Step 4 4 Tap your Apple ID email address. This is located at the top of your phone screen. Image titled Change Your Primary Apple ID Phone Number on an iPhone Step 5 5 Tap . Image titled Change Your Primary Apple ID Phone Number on an iPhone Step 6 6 Tap to go back. Image titled Change Your Primary Apple ID Phone Number on an iPhone Step 7 7 Tap to go back. Image titled Change Your Primary Apple ID Phone Number on an iPhone Step 8 8 Tap . This is directly below . Image titled Change Your Primary Apple ID Phone Number on an iPhone Step 9 9 Tap . This will be located at the top of your phone screen. Image titled Change Your Primary Apple ID Phone Number on an iPhone Step 10 10 Tap . You've now unlinked your old phone number from your Apple ID account. Calls or messages to your old phone will no longer appear on other Apple devices that you are signed into with your Apple ID. Advertisement

Image titled Change Your Primary Apple ID Phone Number on an iPhone Step 11 1 Open the Settings menu on your new iPhone. Image titled Change Your Primary Apple ID Phone Number on an iPhone Step 12 2 Scroll down and tap . Image titled Change Your Primary Apple ID Phone Number on an iPhone Step 13 3 Check that the iMessages feature is on for your phone. The white circle next to iMessage should be in the on position. Image titled Change Your Primary Apple ID Phone Number on an iPhone Step 14 4 Scroll down and tap . Image titled Change Your Primary Apple ID Phone Number on an iPhone Step 15 5 Tap . It's at the top of your screen. Image titled Change Your Primary Apple ID Phone Number on an iPhone Step 16 6 Sign in with your Apple ID account. Use the same Apple ID that was on your old phone. Make sure there are check-marks next to your new phone number and Apple ID under You Can Be Reached By iMessage At. Image titled Change Your Primary Apple ID Phone Number on an iPhone Step 17 7 Tap . It's in the upper left corner. Image titled Change Your Primary Apple ID Phone Number on an iPhone Step 18 8 Tap . It should be directly beneath . Image titled Change Your Primary Apple ID Phone Number on an iPhone Step 19 9 Check that the FaceTime feature is on for your phone. The white circle next to FaceTime should be in the on position. Image titled Change Your Primary Apple ID Phone Number on an iPhone Step 20 10 Tap . It's near the top of the screen. Image titled Change Your Primary Apple ID Phone Number on an iPhone Step 21 11 Sign in with your Apple ID account. Your new phone number can now be used to send and receive iMessages and FaceTime calls. Make sure it's the same Apple ID account you signed in to for iMessage. Make sure under You Can Be Reached By FaceTime At, your new phone number and Apple ID both have check-marks both have check-marks. Advertisement
